name: HASANDE PON! ver1.00
description:
It is an action puzzle with easy operation of cursor key and 1 button.
I will put the panel on the board with the same rules as Reversi.
If you have an enemy on the panel when turning over the panel you can defeat that enemy.
When you defeat all enemies it is stage clear.
Touching enemies, making panels impossible, time-up makes mistakes.
Please challenge all 10 stages.

------------------------------------------------------------------------
